history.proof: intros f g Hl. unfold equi. split. - intros H. sfirstorder depth: 3. - intros H. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros f g Hl. unfold Proper, respectful in Hl. intros x y Heq. unfold equi. split. - intros H. rewrite Hl with (m:=x) (y:=y). apply H. - intros H. rewrite <- Hl with (m:=x) (y:=y). apply H.
